topics.body:
!http://41.media.tumblr.com/f17d0be940a275008720fdaba527ca69/tumblr_nkzd8fFXGf1rk23vqo1_1280.png!
_For handy reference, here is all of the characters in one convenient lineup._

_This will be it as far as introducing additional characters go.  Before I started anything else proper, I wanted to give you guys some bits and pieces of background information to play around with so that ya’ll had ammo for fan stuff._

_And for all you guys asking about specifically what height everyone is, I’ll throw ya’ll one bone._

_Arthur is 5 Foot 11 Inches (hair not included)._

_I’ll leave the math up to the rest of you guys :V_

----------------------

So for now, no more new characters, just building on who we already know. Kinda disappointed that there's no confirmed relatives of Vivi though, only acquaintances, but I'm still ok with that as they are interesting to me.

I'm considering making a Mystery Skulls thread btw, I mean if you guys want one then I'll be happy to make one
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fea64a6368723d125f2700#post_54fea64a6368723d125f2700
Who's the little Hamtaro lookin' motherfucker?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fea70563687206aed91a00#post_54fea70563687206aed91a00
!http://31.media.tumblr.com/013a50944b9bfe054c1d8733f777c1c8/tumblr_ng8ya8MaW91rk23vqo1_500.gif!
_Arthur’s pet hamster - Galahad (While that is his “legal” name, he is more commonly referred to as “Galaham”)_

_Galahad was born with a condition that left his lower half paralyzed.  With Arthur’s mechanical know-how, he built the little guy some fancy new wheels that allowed him to move about to a surprising degree._

_Arthur regards him to be his tiny assistant, though his aptitude at mechanics and robotics are questionable (at best).  He doesn’t let that get in his way though and will tinker with random objects when no one else is looking._

_Whenever something just randomly falls apart at Kingsmens Mechanics, odds are you’ll find Galaham nearby with cheeks stuffed with screws and bolts._

———————————

Yeah I think this proves that there's still enough MSG-A material out there to warrant making its own thread

Also I'm a nerd and I did the math and Vivi comes out to approximately 5'6" or 5'7" -[spoiler](a perfect size for cuddling)[/spoiler]-
